StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [CopyContactCardtoNextFY]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContactCardID uniqueiden..er AS BEGIN
INSERT INTO RSSOSS.USMC.ContactCard( ID, DatePrepared, ForFY, LastName, FirstName, MiddleName, Home_Street1, Home_Street2, Home_City, Home_County, Home_State, Home_ZipCode, Home_Phone, Work_Street1, Work_Street2, Work_City, Work_County, Work_State, Work_ZipCode, Work_Phone, EmailAddress, A.lia.ons, FormerUSMC, Other, ValueToRSS ) select newid(), getdate(), ForFY + 1, LastName, FirstName, MiddleName, Home_Street1, Home_Street2, Home_City, Home_County, Home_State, Home_ZipCode, Home_Phone, Work_Street1, Work_Street2, Work_City, Work_County, Work_State, Work_ZipCode, Work_Phone, EmailAddress, A.lia.ons, FormerUSMC, Other, ValueToRSS from RSSOSS.USMC.ContactCard where ID = @ContactCardID END
